title: Smart Data Models - GovSteamFV3
description: Adapted from CIM data models. Simplified GovSteamIEEE1 Steam turbine governor model with Prmax limit and fast valving.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be GovSteamFV3

k.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor gain, (reciprocal of droop) (K).  Typical Value = 20. Default: 0.0

k1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of turbine power developed after first boiler pass (K1).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

k2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of turbine power developed after second boiler pass (K2).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0.0

k3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Fraction of hp turbine power developed after crossover or third boiler pass (K3). Typical Value = 0.6. Default: 0.0

mwbase.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Base for power values (MWbase) (>0).  Unit = MW. Default: 0.0

pmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening, PU of MWbase (Pmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

pmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum valve opening, PU of MWbase (Pmin).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0.0

prmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Max. pressure in reheater (Prmax).  Typical Value = 1. Default: 0.0

t1.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lead time constant (T1).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t2.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Governor lag time constant (T2).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t3.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Valve positioner time constant (T3).  Typical Value = 0. Default: 0

t4.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Inlet piping/steam bowl time constant (T4).  Typical Value = 0.2. Default: 0

t5.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of second boiler pass (i.e. reheater) (T5).  Typical Value = 0.5. Default: 0

t6.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant of crossover or third boiler pass (T6).  Typical Value = 10. Default: 0

ta.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time to close intercept valve (IV) (Ta).  Typical Value = 0.97. Default: 0

tb.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time until IV starts to reopen (Tb).  Typical Value = 0.98. Default: 0

tc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time until IV is fully open (Tc).  Typical Value = 0.99. Default: 0

uc.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve closing velocity (Uc).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = -1. Default: 0.0

uo.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum valve opening velocity (Uo).  Unit = PU/sec.  Typical Value = 0.1. Default: 0.0
